questions.question: Formula for Amplitude Modulation index is?

answers.a: MOSFET is a unipolar, voltage controlled, two terminal device
answers.b: MOSFET is a bipolar, current controlled, three terminal device
answers.c: MOSFET is a unipolar, voltage controlled, three terminal device
answers.d: MOSFET is a bipolar, current controlled, two terminal device

questions.question: In pulse width modulated inverters, the output voltage is controlled by controlling?
A VSI will have a better performance if its?

answers.a: load inductance is large and source inductance is small
answers.b: load inductance is small and source inductance is large
answers.c: both load inductance and source inductance are large
answers.d: both load inductance and source inductance are small

questions.question: PWM switching is used in voltage source inverters for the purpose of __________.

answers.b: Controlling output harmonics and output voltage
